So that's our base done.
Now time to make the custard

Crack 5 large free-range eggs into a bowl,
add 100 grams of golden caster sugar and
whisk for two minutes.
Heat 300 milliliters of double cream and 300

milliliters of whole milk with 125 grams of
unsalted butter and the
husk and seeds of 1 vanilla pod.
Leave to simmer on a medium heat for 5 minutes

Then, whisking constantly, add the hot
cream mixture to the eggs and sugar
And pour some over the panettone
